snippet: The Russian finance ministry says it is owed $3 billion, escalating a legal battle between the countries that is already raging in European courts.
abstract: Russia sues Ukraine in London High Court over $3 billion in unpaid loans.
lead_paragraph: The Russian finance ministry says it is owed $3 billion, escalating a legal battle between the countries that is already raging in European courts.

headline.main: Russia Sues Ukraine in London Court Over Unpaid Debt Claim
headline.print_headline: Russia Sues Ukraine in London Over Unpaid Debt Claim
